attributes.action: add disabled people in the computer scheme currently being run just for households with children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
at the present time there is a scheme for all households on low income with children to be able to claim for a computer would it not be fair to ask for this scheme to add disabled people with whom a computer would help in so many ways as some are housebound
maybe with the criteria for those on dla middle rate and above
